name: Avoid hardcoded timeout in Process Activities (TIBCO BW)
description: This rule searches for ProcessActivities having a timeout not starting with %% (so defined by a Global Variable).
output:
This report lists all  Processe Activities having an hardcoded timeout.
It provides the following information:
Process Activity full name.
The associated value is the timeout value.
rationale:
A connection is not configurable if one element of its configuration is not set by using a Global Variable.
The timeout is one of these elements. Such hardcoded value makes it harder to move from one environment to another without changing each hardcoded value.
reference:
3.1.2 GEN-002: Connections not configurable
Rules/ERROR-Hardcoded_activities_timeout-JDBC_activities.rule (QA Rules from Behaim IT Solutions).
remediation:
Define a Global Variable for the timeout, and set the timeout paremeter to this GV.
Sample GV value : "%%Connections/JDBC/TImeout%%"
alternativeName: Avoid hardcoded timeout in Process Activities (TIBCO BW)
